thag5.11:1.3_0: I’ve seen the Blessed One myself,
thag5.11:1.4_0: and he was about to return in my dwelling.
thag5.11:2.2_0: spent much of the night in the open;
thag5.11:2.3_0: then he, who is so skilled in meditation,
thag5.11:3.3_0: like a lion in a rocky cave,
thag5.11:3.4_0: with fear and dread given up.
thag5.11:4.2_0: Soṇa, a disciple of the Buddha,
thag5.11:5.1_0: When he has completely understood the five aggregates,
